title: Die XXVII Septembris Hora VIII Qvatvor Selectae Classis Discipvli Vltimos In Paedagogio Regio Sermones Habebvnt

source: Freyer, Hieronymus  Saltzmann, Carl August  Bandemer, Peter Otto  Philippi, Christian Gottfried  Schrader, Georg Christoph: Die XXVII Septembris Hora VIII Qvatvor Selectae Classis Discipvli Vltimos In Paedagogio Regio Sermones Habebvnt  Ad Qvos Benevole Avdiendos Pvblicvmqve Coetvs Vniversi Examen Cohonestandvm Scholarvm Patronos, Favtores Et Amicos Observantissime Ac Perhvmaniter Invitat De Stvdiorum Litterariorvm Vsv In Ecclesia Christi Pavca Praefatvs Hieronymvs Freyer, Paed.
